GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Custom Name Format - Replace Household Name Formats
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Regenerates and replaces the household names using formats.
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Custom Name Format - Replace Household Name Formats
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_REPLACEHOUSEHOLDNAMEFORMATS ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @WHICH int, @STARTDATE datetime = null ) as set nocount off;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp_nfstor') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp_nfstor
DECLARE @nameformatfunction uniqueidentifier; DECLARE @STARTINGDATE datetime;
DECLARE @GCINSTANCEID uniqueidentifier SELECT @GCINSTANCEID = GCC.ID FROM dbo.GLOBALCHANGECATALOG GCC WHERE GCC.PROCEDURENAME = 'USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_REPLACEHOUSEHOLDNAMEFORMATS'
IF @STARTDATE IS NULL BEGIN SELECT TOP 1 @STARTINGDATE = bps.ENDEDON FROM dbo.GLOBALCHANGE gc JOIN dbo.GLOBALCHANGESTATUS gcs ON gcs.PARAMETERSETID = gc.ID JOIN dbo.GLOBALCHANGECATALOG gcc ON gcc.ID = gc.GLOBALCHANGECATALOGID JOIN dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE bpi ON bpi.BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID = gcs.PARAMETERSETID JOIN dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSSTATUS bps ON bps.BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID = gcs.PARAMETERSETID WHERE bps.STATUS = 'Completed' and gcc.ID = @GCINSTANCEID ORDER BY bps.ENDEDON DESC END ELSE BEGIN SET @STARTINGDATE = @STARTDATE; END
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try IF @WHICH = 1 BEGIN IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp_nfstor1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp_nfstor1
SELECT @nameformatfunction = ID FROM dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION WHERE FORMATSQLFUNCTION = 'USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_ADDRESSEE_INFORMAL'
;with cte_households as ( SELECT con.ID, con.KEYNAME, (SELECT TOP 1 MEMBERID FROM dbo.GROUPMEMBER WHERE GROUPID = con.ID AND MEMBERID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ISPRIMARY DESC ) as PrimaryMember FROM dbo.V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT con WHERE dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_ISHOUSEHOLD(con.ID) = 1 AND con.DATEADDED > @STARTINGDATE
) SELECT cte_households.ID, cte_households.KEYNAME, cte_households.PRIMARYMEMBER, CAST('' as nvarchar(700)) as FORMATTEDNAME INTO #temp_nfstor1 FROM cte_households WHERE cte_households.PrimaryMember IS NOT NULL
-- set the format update #temp_nfstor1 SET FORMATTEDNAME = dbo.UFN_NAMEFORMAT_FROMID(@nameformatfunction, PrimaryMember)
UPDATE con SET con.KEYNAME = #temp_nfstor1.FORMATTEDNAME, con.DISPLAYNAME = '', con.CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, con.DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE FROM dbo.CONSTITUENT con INNER JOIN #temp_nfstor1 ON con.ID = #temp_nfstor1.ID and len(isnull(#temp_nfstor1.FORMATTEDNAME, '')) > 0
UPDATE GD SET GD.NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID = @nameformatfunction FROM dbo.GROUPDATA GD INNER JOIN #temp_nfstor1 ON GD.ID = #temp_nfstor1.ID and len(isnull(#temp_nfstor1.FORMATTEDNAME, '')) > 0
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp_nfstor1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp_nfstor1
END
IF @WHICH = 2 BEGIN IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp_nfstor2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp_nfstor2
SELECT @nameformatfunction = ID FROM dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION WHERE FORMATSQLFUNCTION = 'USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_ADDRESSEE_INFORMAL'
;with cte_households as ( SELECT con.ID, con.KEYNAME, (SELECT TOP 1 MEMBERID FROM dbo.GROUPMEMBER WHERE GROUPID = con.ID AND MEMBERID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ISPRIMARY DESC ) as PrimaryMember FROM dbo.V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT con WHERE dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_ISHOUSEHOLD(con.ID) = 1 AND con.DATECHANGED > @STARTINGDATE
) SELECT cte_households.ID, cte_households.KEYNAME, cte_households.PRIMARYMEMBER, CAST('' as nvarchar(700)) as FORMATTEDNAME INTO #temp_nfstor2 FROM cte_households WHERE cte_households.PrimaryMember IS NOT NULL
-- set the format update #temp_nfstor2 SET FORMATTEDNAME = dbo.UFN_NAMEFORMAT_FROMID(@nameformatfunction, PrimaryMember)
UPDATE con SET con.KEYNAME = #temp_nfstor2.FORMATTEDNAME, con.DISPLAYNAME = '', con.CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, con.DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE FROM dbo.CONSTITUENT con INNER JOIN #temp_nfstor2 ON con.ID = #temp_nfstor2.ID and len(isnull(#temp_nfstor2.FORMATTEDNAME, '')) > 0
UPDATE GD SET GD.NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID = @nameformatfunction FROM dbo.GROUPDATA GD INNER JOIN #temp_nfstor2 ON GD.ID = #temp_nfstor2.ID and len(isnull(#temp_nfstor2.FORMATTEDNAME, '')) > 0
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp_nfstor2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp_nfstor2
END
IF @WHICH = 3 BEGIN IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp_nfstor3') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp_nfstor3
SELECT @nameformatfunction = ID FROM dbo.NAMEFORMATFUNCTION WHERE FORMATSQLFUNCTION = 'USR_UFN_NAMEFORMAT_HOUSEHOLD_ADDRESSEE_INFORMAL'
;with cte_households as ( SELECT con.ID, con.KEYNAME, (SELECT TOP 1 MEMBERID FROM dbo.GROUPMEMBER WHERE GROUPID = con.ID AND MEMBERID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ISPRIMARY DESC ) as PrimaryMember FROM dbo.V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT con WHERE dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_ISHOUSEHOLD(con.ID) = 1 AND con.DATEADDED > @STARTINGDATE
) SELECT cte_households.ID, cte_households.KEYNAME, cte_households.PRIMARYMEMBER, CAST('' as nvarchar(700)) as FORMATTEDNAME INTO #temp_nfstor3 FROM cte_households WHERE cte_households.PrimaryMember IS NOT NULL
-- set the format update #temp_nfstor3 SET FORMATTEDNAME = dbo.UFN_NAMEFORMAT_FROMID(@nameformatfunction, PrimaryMember)
UPDATE con SET con.KEYNAME = #temp_nfstor3.FORMATTEDNAME, con.DISPLAYNAME = '', con.CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, con.DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE FROM dbo.CONSTITUENT con INNER JOIN #temp_nfstor3 ON con.ID = #temp_nfstor3.ID and len(isnull(#temp_nfstor3.FORMATTEDNAME, '')) > 0
UPDATE GD SET GD.NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID = @nameformatfunction FROM dbo.GROUPDATA GD INNER JOIN #temp_nfstor3 ON GD.ID = #temp_nfstor3.ID and len(isnull(#temp_nfstor3.FORMATTEDNAME, '')) > 0
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp_nfstor3') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp_nfstor3
END
end try
begin catch IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp_nfstor') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp_nfstor exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
